channel.title: Sinister 718 * Perfection *
channel.description:
Play now on Web client [url=http://sinister718.com/play.php]http://sinister718.com/play.php[/url] Download Client (Recommended) [url=http://sinister718.com/play.php]http://sinister718.com/play.php[/url] Join us now HERE ! [url=http://sinister718.com/]http://sinister718.com/[/url]
Welcome to Sinister 718, a revolutionary 718 with amazing content,An amazing community and Owners/Staff that actually LISTEN to what the players want.
Features- -Fully working Nex with Minions -Dicing -Amazing Donor benefits(donorzone,yell,Dicing,etc) -Mini Tutorial to Help you get started -Fully Working Revenants -Fully Working Pest Control -Working Castle wars -Working Duel Arena(staking) -AMAZING skilling zone, Skilling is just as good money as pvm and pking to keep skillers happy! -Easier xp rate, Not so easy that you get 99's in everything but reasonable -24 working skills(dung,hunter,summoning included!) -Full Gwd with working boss's/minions -Working Corp -Dag kings -Kbd -KQ -Tormented Demons -Frost Dragons -Amazing pkp Shop to encourage pkers -HIGHSCORES -Fully working slayer(Feature that allows you to ask the master and get where your task is located) -Funpk -Actual Difficulty(agility pipe at taverly actually takes 80 agility etc)
You will NEVER see a server like Sinister 718, This server has everything you could want and then some, It's got plenty of content(pking,gambling,pvm,etc). This server is going to be around a LONG time so come join today and become part of our community!

item.title: Sinister 718 * Perfection *

item.description:

Join us now HERE ! http://sinister718.com/

Welcome to Sinister 718, a revolutionary 718 with amazing content,An amazing community and Owners/Staff that actually LISTEN to what the players want.

Features-
-Fully working Nex with Minions
-Dicing
-Amazing Donor benefits(donorzone,yell,Dicing,etc)
-Mini Tutorial to Help you get started
-Fully Working Revenants
-Fully Working Pest Control
-Working Castle wars
-Working Duel Arena(staking)
-AMAZING skilling zone, Skilling is just as good money as pvm and pking to keep skillers happy!
-Easier xp rate, Not so easy that you get 99’s in everything but reasonable
-24 working skills(dung,hunter,summoning included!)
-Full Gwd with working boss’s/minions
-Working Corp
-Dag kings
-Kbd
-KQ
-Tormented Demons
-Frost Dragons
-Amazing pkp Shop to encourage pkers
-HIGHSCORES
-Fully working slayer(Feature that allows you to ask the master and get where your task is located)
-Funpk
-Actual Difficulty(agility pipe at taverly actually takes 80 agility etc)

You will NEVER see a server like Sinister 718, This server has everything you could want and then some, It’s got plenty of content(pking,gambling,pvm,etc). This server is going to be around a LONG time so come join today and become part of our community!
